comment: API-only test expectations - what we CAN get from v4 API

addons.label: $old!it
addons.name: old-it
addons.description_contains: This tiny addon celebrates you with an olympic cheer
addons.note: Name loses $ in slugify, description has BBCode

comment: API limitations - what we CANNOT get from API-only
missing_features: created-date - not in v3 or v4 API
tag-list - only categoryId available, not rich tags
clean description - API has BBCode, not plain text summary
special chars in name - slugify removes $, !, etc
